page.title: 17NORTH ROAD LADIES CLUB
page.content: The Ladies Club has been in existence for 17 years and has met monthly at North Road School. It has about 30 members,half of these being founder members.Over the past years the Ladies Club has had mystery tours, visits,skittles,treasure hunts & a barbecue,all extra to the monthly meetings.Membership is Â£2 a year. One of our most interesting speakers was Mr Bullock of Radio Bristol on antiques,and the ladies brought antiques to be dated and valued.A coffee evening and fashion show raised over Â£100 for the charity "Break" holidays for the handicapped. The County of Avon now want to double the cost of the school,which may force us to disband.We have appealed,and are still awaiting the outcome.
